commit.message:
Auto merge of #10047 - Alexendoo:collapsible-str-replace-msrv, r=xFrednet

Add 1.58 MSRV for `collapsible_str_replace`

The `Pattern` impl for `[char; N]` was added in 1.58

changelog: Enhancement: [`collapsible_str_replace`]: Now takes MSRV into consideration. The minimal version is 1.58
[#10047](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/10047)

files.patch:
@@ -1,25 +1,25 @@

-  --> $DIR/collapsible_str_replace.rs:19:27

 LL |     let _ = "hesuo worpd".replace('s', "l").replace('u', "l");
    |                           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: replace with: `replace(['s', 'u'], "l")`
    |
    = note: `-D clippy::collapsible-str-replace` implied by `-D warnings`
